# BirthBuild
> AI-powered website builder for birth workers. Beautiful websites for doulas, midwives, and antenatal educators.

## What is BirthBuild?
BirthBuild is a website builder designed specifically for birth workers. Non-technical users build professional websites through a guided AI chatbot conversation or a form-based dashboard. Sites are deployed to a subdomain on birthbuild.com.

## Features
- AI-powered content writing (bios, service descriptions, taglines)
- Curated colour palettes and typography for birth work
- Mobile-first responsive design
- SEO built in (schema markup, meta tags, sitemap)
- Contact forms and social links
- Photo upload with automatic optimisation
- Instant hosting on birthbuild.com subdomains
- Instructor mode for doula training workshops

## Pricing
- Free: Build and preview your site, all palettes and fonts, up to 4 pages
- Pro (9 GBP/month or 89 GBP/year): Publish to yourname.birthbuild.com, unlimited pages and rebuilds, SEO and schema markup, contact form and social links, priority support

## Links
- Website: https://birthbuild.com
- Blog: https://birthbuild.com/blog
- Get started: https://birthbuild.com/app
